text: Viktor Pavlovich Makhorin (, July 2, 1948 - June 20, 1993) was Soviet/Russian handball player who competed in the 1980 Summer Olympics. He was born in Toshkent, Toshkent Shahri, Uzbekistan. In 1980 he won the silver medal with the Soviet team. He played all six matches and scored seven goals. ==External links== *Viktor Makhorin's profile at databaseOlympics *Biography of Viktor Makhorin Category:1948 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Soviet male handball players Category:Russian male handball players Category:Handball players at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic handball players of the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic medalists in handball Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Viktor Makhorin
